channel.title: Anne Tallentire on Artangled
channel.description: Recent content in Anne Tallentire on Artangled

item.title: Anne Tallentire - As Happens | Hollybush Gardens
item.description: The works in this small exhibition are grouped around the idea of scale - measurements. In the main room, Anne Tallentire shows us Area, wall-mounted, flat-coloured MDF panels corresponding to the dimensions, rather than the appearance, of objects in the communal area of a public housing complex in Graz: the work was first shown in that city in 2018. Originally shown, in other words, before the pandemic which has made us measure things in new ways.
